Title: Allows a person acting as de facto parent to apply to the supreme court for a writ of habeas corpus
Summary: Allows a person acting as de facto parent to apply to the supreme court for a writ of habeas corpus to have a minor child brought before the court.
LawCode: Amd ยง70, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to allowing a person acting as de facto parent to apply to the supreme court for a writ of habeas corpus
